attributes.additional_details: Also if the other parent is being non cooperative then this should be penalised
attributes.background: In an attempt to get a review of the way in which the Child Maintenance Service calculate payements whilst not taking into consideration any other financial commitments the paying parent has or wether they are capable / willing to care for and contribute in their own way

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you'd like the Child Maintenance Service to be changed.
